channel.title: Apocalypse World: Burned Over: The Bottomless Vaults
channel.description:
It is said that fire rises. When the world was burned over, our ancestors fled to where the fire wouldn't reach them. Thus, they all fled underground.
This session is scheduled for 3 hours. This session will be recorded using StreamYard. Being able to attend each session is ideal, but not required. You must RSVP to each session you wish to attend.
﻿We will be using the [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg), as well as Lines and Veils. We will abide by [The Gauntlet Community Code of Conduct](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/community-code-of-conduct.html).
[date=2020-04-05 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-04-05 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 1](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M2dfCSwApiuV_bvgWpP) [date=2020-04-12 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-04-12 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 2](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M2dfJznRVLbRkYq3ewt) [date=2020-04-19 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-04-19 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"][Session 3](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M2dfQ4EuMSoBj1RXlPc) [date=2020-04-26 time=20:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] → [date=2020-04-26 time=23:00:00 format="LLLL" timezone="America/New_York"] [Session 4](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-M2dfVeTXHXzMueqStld)

It is said that fire rises. When the world was burned over, our ancestors fled to where the fire wouldn’t reach them. Thus, they all fled underground.
